A Chat with Tara Robertson

Our 2nd Openscapes Community Call featured our chat with Tara Robertson, a diversity, equity, and inclusion consultant working with us to improve practices in Openscapes. The recording is on Openscapes YouTube (efficiency tip reminder: in YouTube, ‚ÄúL‚Äù will advance by 10 seconds, ‚ÄúJ‚Äù will go back by 10 seconds üòÄ)
